question: What is being referred to as “SANT” that is in news recently?
explanation:
India has successfully test-fired the Stand Off Anti-Tank (SANT) Missile, off the coast of Odisha. The missile has been developed by the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) for Indian Air Force.
The missile has a special Lock-on After Launch and Lock-on Before Launch capability which makes it a highly tactical warfare equipment.
